name: read-through-s3-memory-cache
description: Read-through in-memory cache for S3 objects that are reasonable to cache in memory

scripts.private-install: rm -rf node_modules && npm run assert-latest-node && npm install && npm list 1>/dev/null
scripts.private-install-prod: rm -rf node_modules && npm run assert-latest-node && npm install --production && npm list 1>/dev/null
scripts.test: npm run assert-latest-node && npm list 1>/dev/null && node scripts/test.js
